column2: The faith of the liege is the only one allowed in this realm. All infedel and heretical practices are actively rooted out.
This realm does not discriminate against different faiths and all religions are allowed under its borders, without any form of proselytizing being allowed by the government.

This ruler has approved crown laws granting freedom of cult under their realm. The tolerant regime allows them to treat fairly better with some of their subjects, but alienate them the sympathies of the more zealous members of their own claimed religion.
In your realm people of different faiths are allowed to freely follow their customs and rites, without fear of persecution.
There was a time when your realm allowed foreign cults in its border, but that time is passed.
In the last days you've developed a new fervor for your religious beliefs, is it really just to freely allow heathen teachings inside your realm?
Almighty Pope, one of your Emperors allows heathens in their realm. What should we do?

Your tolerant rule has not gone unseen. [From.GetTitledName] has issued a seal condemning your doubtful stand on the supremacy of the One True Church and casted you out, forbidding you to take part in the Holy Communion.

A papal envoy brought a very angry letter from St. Peter's seat today, making several compelling arguments against the fancy notion of allowing infidels to practice freely within your borders. Luckily, there doesn't seem to be much substance nor threats involved in the missing.
Almighty Pope, the apostate sent money instead. Should we still allow his heathenry ways?

Your donation seems to have been enough to buy salvation from your ill-made edict to yourself and your subjects, at least for the moment. The papal envoy still made some vague threats, but your excommunication has been lifted, for the time being.
The papal envoy returned with an even more outraged answer. The Pope has openly denounced your attempted bribing and confirms once more the anathema upon your soul.
Now that you have restored order and justice inside your realm, rightfully condemning the infidels inside it, the Pope has allowed you back inside the Church.
This branch effects how foreign cults are treated within your realm.

This realm has been plunged into darkness and blasphemy as heathens are allowed to pray their false idols in absolute freedom. It might be time to change its corrupted rulership and cleanse it to restore sovereignty of your faith in its borders.
Even if you have allowed free worship of other gods under your rule, that doesn't automatically prevent you from defending the interests of your faith outside of your borders, right?
His Holiness might need a little more convincing to allow you back into the One True Church.
Almighty Pope, a ruler threatens you to lift his excommunication. What to do?
After much pondering, His Holiness has finally admitted the error of His previous judgement and agreed to immediately lift your excommunication.

Despite being trapped in his own city with your soldiers at his door, the Pope today publicly denounced you again, stating no threats nor any army can overrule the judgement of the Vicar of Christ on Earth.
Almighty Pope an excommunicated ruler attacks us. What should we do?

His Holiness [From.GetTitledName] has issued a call to arms against the foul armies of [FromFrom.GetTitledName] to defend the Holy See from this blasphemous heretic whose crimes against the One True Church have already been denounced several times.
This realm nominally recognizes itself with the faith of its ruler, but lacks authority or reason to fully impose itself over the infidels inside its borders.
